about_the_game:
Over an hour of original music perfect for digging, growing, and taking care of an increasingly complex fortress of dwarves and other creatures. This soundtrack is the result of a unique collaboration between three different composers brought together for the first time:

Dabu - composer for games like Winding Worlds, Goodbye Volcano High, and Gnog, as well as audio designer for Boyfriend Dungeon
Simon Swerwer - community favorite Dwarf Fortress composer specializing in dwarven lyrics & vocals
Agueda Macias - expert player of the viola de gamba, mixing Baroque and Bazilian genres

It's a pleasant yet ambient soundtrack, perfect for playing virtually any game, whether virtual or tabletop, or just listening for pleasure.

name: Dwarf Fortress Soundtrack (Fortress)
short_description: The perfect, hearty accompaniment to centuries of fortress-building. Listen to real dwarven songs of celebration and mourning as your fortress grows and inevitably withers.
